text:
Question 70) Researchers recovered DNA from mammoth bones (Mammuthus primigenius) found in Siberia, which were about 28,000 years confirmed by the carbon-14 technique.
The dating technique presented in the text is only possible due to
A) known proportion between carbon-14 and carbon-12 in the atmosphere over the years.
B) decomposition of all carbon-12 present in the body after death.
C) Greater carbon-14 final on organism tissues after death.
D) carbon emission-12 by organism tissues after death.
E) Carbon-12 transformation into carbon-14 over the years.
